title: MLLM Pretraining with Event Semantic Structures

definitions.Pretraining: The process of training a model on a large dataset before using it for a specific task
definitions.Event Semantic Structures: A framework for understanding and representing events in a structured manner

summary: The slide presents the concept of MLLM Pretraining with Event Semantic Structures, explaining the process and its components. It includes a diagram illustrating the relationships between entities, agents, and actions in an event context.
